content.prompt: Dr. Rudolphâ€™s class has a big test coming up next week. Which of the following students is using a studying strategy that is most likely to lead to memory consolidation?

choices.label: Marcus does not study until the night before the test, when he studies for eight hours straight.
Elizabeth studies for a half hour before she goes to bed each night the week before the exam.
Sharon does not study for the test, but she pays close attention, asks lots of questions, and takes good notes during class.
Mario studies by repeating his class notes to himself multiple times.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
